fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Knight a player each night, they gain Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot knight the same player twice, unless you'd have no valid targets otherwise.
- On death, you may freely vote the player voted by the one you last knighted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
